embeddableConfig.content:
## AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF) Logs Overview

- Visualizes traffic and threat patterns from AWS WAF logs.
- Shows request trends by action and source, country distribution, top offending IPs and URLs, and rule effectiveness.
- Use it to monitor attacks, validate WAF rule performance, and detect unusual traffic behavior.

query.esql:
FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.action IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.action, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.action IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.action, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.action IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.action, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| WHERE geo.country.iso_code IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY geo.country.iso_code
| SORT total DESC

FROM logs*
| WHERE geo.country.iso_code IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY geo.country.iso_code
| SORT total DESC

FROM logs*
| WHERE geo.country.iso_code IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY geo.country.iso_code
| SORT total DESC

FROM logs*
| WHERE client.address IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY client.address
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| WHERE client.address IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY client.address
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| WHERE client.address IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY client.address
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.source.name IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.source.name, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.source.name IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.source.name, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.source.name IS NOT NULL
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.source.name, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY geo.country.iso_code
| SORT total DESC

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY geo.country.iso_code
| SORT total DESC

FROM logs*
| WHERE aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY geo.country.iso_code
| SORT total DESC

FROM logs*
| WHERE client.address IS NOT NULL AND aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY client.address
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| WHERE client.address IS NOT NULL AND aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY client.address
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| WHERE client.address IS NOT NULL AND aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY client.address
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

embeddableConfig.title: Top 10 source IP addresses by blocked requests

query.esql:
FROM logs*
| WHERE url.path IS NOT NULL AND aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY url.path
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| WHERE url.path IS NOT NULL AND aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY url.path
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| WHERE url.path IS NOT NULL AND aws.waf.action == "BLOCK"
| STATS total = COUNT() BY url.path
| SORT total DESC
| LIMIT 10

FROM logs*
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.terminating_rule.id, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.terminating_rule.id, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM logs*
| STATS total = COUNT() BY aws.waf.terminating_rule.id, time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

attributes.title: [AWS WAF OTEL] AWS Web Application Firewall Logs Overview
